description: Keep up-to-date with business news and what support is available for businesses dealing with the impact of COVID-19. Find out what government schemes are available for self-employed workers, employers and businesses affected by the pandemic. Includes advice on accessing help schemes such as SEISS and CJRS, who is eligible, and how to apply for grants and funding.
